description.value:
Trigger You fall from a height of 15 feet or higher.

Requirements Your mount can reach your landing location with a single Stride.

As you fall, your mount dashes to your rescue. Your mount Strides up to its Speed, positioning itself below you. Rather than falling on your mount, you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Mount] your mount. Treat the triggering fall as if it were 15 feet shorter, and you don't land @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] (though both you and your mount both take damage from the fall based on what you would normally take for any remaining distance).
